content:
Phishing Risk Analysis

Our analysis of the URL "http://192.168.1.1/login.php" has revealed a high phishing risk score of 78. This indicates a strong likelihood that this URL is associated with a phishing attempt. We strongly advise against interacting with this URL.

Key Risk Indicators

  • IP Address as Domain: The use of an IP address (192.168.1.1) in place of a registered domain name is a major red flag. Legitimate websites almost always use domain names (e.g., google.com). IP addresses are often used by phishers to avoid domain registration and scrutiny.
  • Local IP Address: The IP address 192.168.1.1 is a private, local network address. This type of address is typically used within a home or small office network and should never be used for publicly accessible websites. Its presence here is highly suspicious.
  • Generic 'login.php' File: The use of a generic file name like "login.php" is common in phishing attacks. Phishers often mimic legitimate login pages to steal credentials.
  • Lack of HTTPS: The URL uses "http" instead of "https." HTTPS indicates a secure connection, which is standard practice for login pages and other sensitive areas of websites. The absence of HTTPS increases the risk of data interception.

Technical Assessment

The URL "http://192.168.1.1/login.php" presents several technical characteristics that contribute to its high-risk assessment. The domain itself is an IP address, specifically a private IP address reserved for internal networks. This is highly unusual for legitimate public websites. The use of "http" instead of "https" signifies the absence of an SSL certificate, meaning any data transmitted through this URL is not encrypted and could be intercepted. The path "/login.php" suggests a login page, which is a prime target for phishing attacks aiming to steal user credentials. The features data confirms no registered domain name, no DNS records, and no SSL certificate associated with this IP address, further reinforcing the suspicion of a phishing attempt.

What This Means For You

If this URL is indeed a phishing site, interacting with it could lead to several serious consequences. Entering any login credentials, personal information, or financial details on this page could expose that information directly to the attackers. This could result in identity theft, financial fraud, or unauthorized access to your accounts.

Recommended Actions

  • Do not click on this link: Avoid interacting with this URL under any circumstances.
  • Do not enter any information: If you have already visited the page, do not submit any login credentials, personal details, or financial information.
  • Report the suspicious URL: Report this URL to PhishGuard or your security software provider to help protect others from falling victim to this potential phishing attempt.
  • Check your browser history: If you have visited this URL, clear your browser history and cache as a precautionary measure.
